name: late night observations
description:
A small game where you can walk around the island and relax. 
Jump on trees! Watch the waves! Gaze at the stars! 

CONTROLS:

ASDW/ARROW KEYS or left joystick to move
SHIFT or right bumper to run
SPACEBAR or A button to jump
LEFT MOUSE CLICK or Y button to interact

You can use an xbox controller :3
CLICK ON THE LIGHTS TO TURN THEM OFF OR ON!
CLICK ON THE BOOMBOX TO TURN THE MUSIC OFF OR ON!
CLICKING ON AN NPC WILL LET YOU HEAR THEIR THOUGHTS!
